title.narrative: USAID redacted this field in accordance with the exceptions outlined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act of 2016.

description.narrative: Objectives for Afghanistan: The objectives are: Capacity to institutionalize nutrition programs enhanced, Adoption of optimal nutrition and hygiene behaviors at community and household levels increased, and Availability of nutrition, hygiene, and sanitation services and products increased.
USAID redacted this field in accordance with the exceptions outlined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act of 2016.
